Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.object.Transform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Transform
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Holds transform data for GameObjects.
